Header: Former Defence Secretary and IGP to be called to Parliamentary Select Committee
Content: Colombo (News 1st): Former Defence Secretary Hemasiri Fernando and IGP Pujith Jayasundara are due to be called before the Parliamentary Select Committee appointed to probe the 04/21 attacks. Committee member MP Nalinda Jayatissa noted that according to the evidence, a decision will be taken regarding those who are being summoned.
